name: @ringsnetwork/rings-node
description: Rings is a structured peer-to-peer network implementation using WebRTC, Chord algorithm, and full WebAssembly (WASM) support.

scripts.wasm_pack: wasm-pack build node --scope ringsnetwork -t web --no-default-features --features browser --features console_error_panic_hook
scripts.proto_generate: pbjs -t static-module -o node/pkg/rings_node_proto.js rpc/src/protos/rings_node.proto && pbts -o node/pkg/rings_node_proto.d.ts node/pkg/rings_node_proto.js
scripts.prepare: npm run wasm_pack && npm run proto_generate && cp node/pkg/rings_node* ./dist && npm run build
